content: So when y'all do code reviews, are you stepping through it in vscode/emacs? or is everyone suggesting a simplification just like, i'm sure this'll work
Speaking only for myself, a little of both. leanproject makes it very easy to get everything I need to open up a file in VS Code.
It might be possible to set up the new GitHub code spaces too, to run vs-code on a branch in browser
Ooh, that looks shiny. I signed up for the beta.
